  local!caseRecords: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(

    field: "recordType",
    value: null,
    filterType: "REJECT"
  ),
  local!relatedCaseData: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!caseRecords,
    expression: a!map(
      relationship: fv!item.relationship,
      data: rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord(
        recordType: fv!item.recordType,
        filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: fv!item.recordCaseField,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.caseId]
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!caseData: reduce(
    rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_ConstructCaseDataForEvaluation_reducer,
    ri!case,
    local!relatedCaseData
  ),
  local!taskRecords: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
    records: rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_AvailableFieldsCustomizationsWrapper_Task(),
    field: "recordType",
    value: null,
    filterType: "REJECT"
  ),
  local!relatedTaskData: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!taskRecords,
    expression: a!map(
      relationship: fv!item.relationship,
      data: rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord(
        recordType: fv!item.recordType,
        filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: fv!item.recordTaskField,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!task[recordType!CMGT_Task.taskId]
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!taskData:reduce(
    rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_ConstructTaskDataForEvaluation_reducer,
    ri!task,
    local!relatedTaskData
  ),
  a!map(
    studioData: local!studioData,
    caseData: local!caseData,
    taskData: local!taskData
  )
)

9248008e-2c2c-4eea-bb28-4a3c89838403.name: CMGT_UTIL_RemoveRecordRelationshipsWithSingleKey_Reducer
9248008e-2c2c-4eea-bb28-4a3c89838403.sail_code:
if(
  runtimetypeof(ri!key) <> 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordRelationship',
  ri!record,
  a!match(
    value: index(ri!record, ri!key, null),
    whenTrue: count(fv!value) = 1,
    then: with(
      local!indexedValue: index(
        ri!record,
        ri!key,
        1,
        index(ri!record, ri!key, null)
      ),
      local!subKeys: a!keys(local!indexedValue),
      if(
        length(local!subKeys) = 1,
        remove(ri!record, ri!key),
        #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
          ri!record,
          ri!key,
          reduce(
            rule!CMGT_UTIL_RemoveRecordRelationshipsWithSingleKey_Reducer(record: _, key: _),
            local!indexedValue,
            local!subKeys
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    default: ri!record
  )
)

  local!newTaskActionUuid: index(

      records: ri!taskActionNewUUIDMapping,
      field: "taskActionUuid",
      value: ri!cfgTaskAction[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_TaskActions.taskActionUuid]
    ),
    "newUuid",
    null
  ),
  recordType!CMGT_TaskActions(
    recordType!CMGT_TaskActions.taskInstanceUuid: ri!taskInstanceUUID,
    recordType!CMGT_TaskActions.taskActionUuid: local!newTaskActionUuid,
    recordType!CMGT_TaskActions.actionCode: ri!cfgTaskAction[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_TaskActions.actionCode],
    recordType!CMGT_TaskActions.isActive: ri!cfgTaskAction[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_TaskActions.isActive],
    recordType!CMGT_TaskActions.associatedAssignmentRule: recordType!CMGT_AssignmentRule(
      recordType!CMGT_AssignmentRule.taskActionUuid: local!newTaskActionUuid,
      recordType!CMGT_AssignmentRule.routingType: ri!cfgTaskAction[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_TaskActions.associatedAssignmentRule.routingType],
      recordType!CMGT_AssignmentRule.assignmentVersion: ri!cfgTaskAction[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_TaskActions.associatedAssignmentRule.assignmentVersion],

      recordType!CMGT_AssignmentRule.isActive: ri!cfgTaskAction[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_TaskActions.associatedAssignmentRule.isActive],
      recordType!CMGT_AssignmentRule.caseAssignmentUsersToExclude: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!cfgTaskAction[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_TaskActions.associatedAssignmentRule],
        expression: recordType!CMGT_CaseAssignmentUsersToExclude(
          recordType!CMGT_CaseAssignmentUsersToExclude.username: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_CFG_AssignmentRule_UsersToExclude.username]

)

_a-0000ecb5-acf8-8000-9cf6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*By default all automation type tasks should use the OOB images. 
Any additional or task behavior type specific images should be added here*/
a!match(
  value: ri!taskBehaviorType[recordType!CMGT_CFG_TaskBehaviorType.taskBehaviorTypeId],
  equals: cons!CMGT_REFID_TASK_BEHAVIOR_TYPE_AUTOMATION,
  then: a!match(
    value: ri!taskAction[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_TaskActions.actionCode],
    equals: cons!CMGT_CFG_TXT_ACT_WORKFLOW_ROUTING,
    then: if(
      ri!isSelected,
      document(
        cons!CMGT_WFL_DOC_IMAGE_AUTOMATION_WORKFLOW_ROUTING_SELECTED,
        "url"
      ),
      document(
        cons!CMGT_WFL_DOC_IMAGE_AUTOMATION_WORKFLOW_ROUTING_UNSELECTED,
        "url"
      )
    ),
    equals: cons!CMGT_CFG_TXT_ACT_SEND_EMAIL,
    then: if(
      ri!isSelected,
      document(
        cons!CMGT_WFL_DOC_IMAGE_AUTOMATION_SEND_EMAIL_SELECTED,
        "url"
      ),
      document(
        cons!CMGT_WFL_DOC_IMAGE_AUTOMATION_SEND_EMAIL_UNSELECTED,
        "url"
      )
    ),
    /*Add additional automation type specific images here*/
    default: if(
      ri!isSelected,
      document(
        cons!CMGT_WFL_DOC_IMAGE_AUTOMATION_WORKFLOW_ROUTING_SELECTED,
        "url"
      ),
      document(
        cons!CMGT_WFL_DOC_IMAGE_AUTOMATION_WORKFLOW_ROUTING_UNSELECTED,
        "url"
      )
    )
  ),
  /*Add additional task behaviour type specific images here*/
  default: null
)

_a-0000ed65-13b8-8000-9d44-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_Automation_returnConditionValueForDisplay
_a-0000ed65-13b8-8000-9d44-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!fieldDetails.fieldType,
  whenTrue: tostring(fv!value) = "USERNAME",
  then: if(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(ri!jsonValue),
    tostring(
      rule!CMGT_QR_GetUser(
        username: tostring(ri!jsonValue.id),
        returnType: "SINGLE_OBJECT"
      )[#"urn:appian:record-field:v1:SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER/SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER_FIELD_firstAndLastName"]
    ),
    ""
  ),
  whenTrue: and(
    fv!value = "RecordType",
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!jsonValue)
  ),
  then: a!localVariables(
    local!allSelectedExtraConfigurations: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
      records: ri!fieldDetails.extraConfigurations.configurations.type,
      field: "code",
      value: ri!fieldPathFromJson.extraConfigurations.code,
      filterType: "FIRST_MATCH"
    ),
    a!match(
      value: local!allSelectedExtraConfigurations.recordTypeUuid,
      equals: "SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER",
      then: tostring(
        rule!CMGT_QR_GetUser(
          username: tostring(ri!jsonValue.id),
          returnType: "SINGLE_OBJECT"
        )[#"urn:appian:record-field:v1:SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER/SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER_FIELD_firstAndLastName"]
      ),
      default: a!localVariables(
        local!fieldValue: rule!CMGT_UTIL_RecordBackedDropdownField(
          recordType: local!allSelectedExtraConfigurations.recordType,
          additionalFilters: local!allSelectedExtraConfigurations.filters.additionalFilters,
          value: ri!jsonValue,
          labelField: local!allSelectedExtraConfigurations.filters.dropdownFieldLabels,
          readOnly: true
        ),
        /* for task assignee, clarify that the role mapping is referring to case role */
        if(ri!fieldDetails.fieldUUID = "7576a553-bb91-4848-962a-c7a23a9f3b2d",
        "Case " & local!fieldValue,
        local!fieldValue
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  /*Check for choice list(record type) value from field details*/
  whenTrue: and(
   fv!value = "CHOICE_LIST",
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!jsonValue)
  ),
  /*retrive choice label from its value based on condition value by studio function*/
  then: 
  a!localVariables(
    local!ootbCaseAdditionalInfo: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
      records: {
        a!map(
          displayName: "Status",
          logicFieldName: "status",
          dropdownFieldLabels: recordType!CMGT_CFG_Status.statusLabel,
          additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!CMGT_CFG_Status.type,
            operator: "=",
            value: if(
              ri!fieldDetails.parentRecordTypeUuid= cons!CMGT_UUID_RECORD_TYPE_CASE,
              "CASE",
              "TASK"
              )
          )
        )
      },
      field: "displayName",
      value: ri!fieldDetails.displayName
    ),
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_RecordBackedDropdownField(
      recordType: ri!fieldDetails.recordType,
      additionalFilters: local!ootbCaseAdditionalInfo.additionalFilters,
      value: ri!jsonValue,
      labelField: local!ootbCaseAdditionalInfo.dropdownFieldLabels,
      readOnly: true
    )
  ),
  /*display format for date and date time field without timezone*/
  whenTrue: or(
    fv!value = "DATETIME",
    fv!value = "DATE"
  ),
  then: if(
    contains(
      {
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_AFTER_NOW_OFFSET,
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_AFTER_TODAY_OFFSET,
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_BEFORE_NOW_OFFSET,
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_BEFORE_TODAY_OFFSET,
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_AFTER_TODAY_OFFSET,
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_BEFORE_TODAY_OFFSET
      },
      ri!operator
    ),
    ri!jsonValue,
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_FormatDateTime(
      dateTime: ri!jsonValue,
      includeTime: fv!value = "DATETIME",
      convertToSystemTimeZone:fv!value = "DATE"
    )
  ),
  whenTrue: fv!value = "GROUP",
  then: if(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(ri!jsonValue),
    group(
      tointeger(
        index(index(ri!jsonValue, "id", null), 1, null)
      ),
      "groupName"
    ),
    ""
  ),
  default: tostring(ri!jsonValue)
)

8af695e2-f3e1-4fe7-9755-ff66a47ce843.name: CMGT_UTIL_MergeMaps
8af695e2-f3e1-4fe7-9755-ff66a47ce843.sail_code:
with(
  local!value1_keyed: if(
    isnull(ri!key),
    ri!map1,
    index(ri!map1, ri!key, null)
  ),
  local!value2_keyed: if(
    isnull(ri!key),
    ri!map2,
    index(ri!map2, ri!key, null)
  ),
  local!newValue: if(
    and(
      runtimetypeof(local!value1_keyed) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Map',
      runtimetypeof(local!value2_keyed) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Map'
    ),
    reduce(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_MergeMaps(
        previous: _,
        key: _,
        map1: local!value1_keyed,
        map2: local!value2_keyed
      ),
      a!map(),
      union(
        a!keys(local!value1_keyed),
        a!keys(local!value2_keyed)
      )
    ),
    a!defaultValue(local!value2_keyed, local!value1_keyed)
  ),
  if(
    isnull(ri!key),
    local!newValue,
    #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(ri!previous, ri!key, local!newValue)
  )
)

a!localVariables(
  local!defaultNewComment: recordType!CMGT_Comment(
    recordType!CMGT_Comment.caseId: ri!caseId,
    recordType!CMGT_Comment.isPrivate: false
  ),
  local!newComment: local!defaultNewComment,
  local!defaultPagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
    startIndex: 1,
    batchSize: cons!CMGT_INT_BATCH_SIZE_SMALL,
    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_Comment.createdOn,
      ascending: false
    )
  ),
  local!pagingInfo: a!refreshVariable(
    value: local!defaultPagingInfo,
    refreshOnVarChange: { ri!triggerRefresh }
  ),
  local!selectedCommentsTab: 1,
  local!commentTabs: {
    a!map(
      name: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:bb19d16d-ede0-4ced-90fe-4e42c62dd2df",
      showTab: true,
      showTabCount: false(),
      commentsFilter: {}
    ),
    a!map(
      name: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:14bceb78-21e8-431d-b9fd-2a03025fd2b9",
      showTab: true,
      showTabCount: false(),
      commentsFilter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!CMGT_Comment.isBookmarked,
        operator: "=",
        value: true
      )
    )
  },
  local!searchTerm: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshOnVarChange: local!selectedCommentsTab
  ),
  local!comments: rule!CMGT_QR_GetComment(
    triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
    returnType: "DATA_SUBSET",
    caseId: ri!caseId,
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    additionalFilters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!CMGT_Comment.isPrivate,
        operator: "=",
        value: false
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!CMGT_Comment.taskId,
        operator: "is null"
      ),
      local!commentTabs[local!selectedCommentsTab].commentsFilter
    },
    searchTerm: local!searchTerm,
    includeUserTagsAndDocumentMaps: true,
    includeChildComments: true,
    includeCase: false,
    onlyParentComments: true
  ),
  local!isAddingComment: false,
  local!isInternalUsers: #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:isusermemberofgroup?okey=a!isUserMemberOfGroup"(
    username: tostring(loggedInUser()),
    groups: cons!CMGT_GRP_INTERNAL_USERS
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
    label: "",
    contents: {
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_HeaderField(
        label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:25820981-645b-4037-a045-87cbcd2ef8e4",
        divider: "NONE",
        brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
        showWhen: a!defaultValue(value: ri!showHeader, default: true),
        marginBelow: "NONE"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
        contents: {
          rule!CMGT_UTIL_TabLayout(
            tabs: local!commentTabs,
            activeTab: local!selectedCommentsTab,
            brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
            showWhen: local!isInternalUsers
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
            contents: {
              rule!CMGT_UTIL_DisplayInfoBanner_Basic(
                text: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:6abb4390-2a70-4356-b7f1-f6c59b589e1d",
                brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
                showWhen: not(rule!CMGT_LA_externalUsersExistOnCase(caseId: ri!caseId))
              ),
              /*Allow for additional parent messages to be written*/
              rule!CMGT_LA_Message_Sub_MessageInput(
                comment: local!newComment,
                required: true,
                brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
                showWhen: local!isAddingComment,
                includeExtraInput: true,
                showInlineSaveButton: true,
                onSubmitSaves: {
                  a!save(
                    local!newComment,
                    local!defaultNewComment
                  ),
                  a!save(local!isAddingComment, false),
                  a!save(ri!messageRefresh, now())
                },
                caseId: ri!caseId
              ),
              /*Search section for Messages*/
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
                contents: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
                    items: {
                      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
                        item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(
                          buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
                            label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:15a80821-8cd6-4134-afae-d7c7ba67383e",
                            icon: "comment",
                            saveInto: a!save(local!isAddingComment, true),
                            size: "SMALL",
                            style: "OUTLINE",
                            color: ri!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor,
                            accessibilityText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:c2ce9250-df58-4ed9-ad80-84fd1c3476ca"
                          ),
                          showWhen: not(local!isAddingComment),
                          align: "START"
                        ),
                        width: "AUTO"
                      ),
                      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
                        item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
                          label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Search for Messages"),
                          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                          placeholder: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:8193af8b-0619-40d9-a9c2-a9278ce53eac",
                          value: local!searchTerm,
                          saveInto: local!searchTerm,
                          showWhen: and(
                            or(
                              local!comments.totalCount > 0,
                              a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!searchTerm)
                            ),
                            not(local!isAddingComment)
                          )
                        ),
                        width: "AUTO"
                      )
                    },
                    alignVertical: "TOP",
                    marginAbove: "STANDARD",
                    marginBelow: "NONE"
                  )
                }
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
                contents: {
                  /*Show all messages already attached to case*/
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                    items: local!comments.data,
                    expression: rule!CMGT_LA_Message_Sub_MessageThread_DisplayMessage(
                      comment: fv!item,
                      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
                      triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
                      caseId: ri!caseId,
                      showUserTypeTag: ri!showUserTypeTag,
                      isInternalUsers: local!isInternalUsers,
                      messagRefresh: ri!messageRefresh
                    )
                  ),
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                    label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "No Messages"),
                    labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                    value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                      text: if(
                        isnull(local!searchTerm),
                        #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:355c74ca-7686-486e-8afa-441fae70f06c",
                        #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:7dc0d735-ddda-43a3-88c3-889f6837b3fd"
                      ),
                      color: ri!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor,
                      size: "STANDARD",
                      style: "EMPHASIS"
                    ),
                    showWhen: a!isNullOrEmpty(local!comments.data),
                    marginBelow: "STANDARD"
                  )
                }
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
                contents: rule!CMGT_UTIL_CustomPaging(
                  pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
                  totalCount: local!comments.totalCount,
                  size: "MEDIUM",
                  brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
                ),
                showWhen: and(
                  a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!comments.data),
                  local!comments.totalCount > cons!CMGT_INT_BATCH_SIZE_SMALL
                ),
                marginAbove: "LESS",
                marginBelow: "LESS"
              )
            },
            style: "TRANSPARENT",
            padding: "STANDARD",
            showBorder: false
          )
        },
        style: ri!brandingMap.CardBackgroundColor,
        shape: ri!brandingMap.CardShape,
        padding: "NONE",
        showBorder: ri!brandingMap.CardShowBorder,
        showShadow: ri!brandingMap.CardShowShadow
      )
    }
  )
)

_a-0000eaa7-a5c0-8000-9c22-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable
_a-0000eaa7-a5c0-8000-9c22-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The main rule to merge the ID-output of a WriteRecords SS node back to the input process variable.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule CMGT_UTIL_DropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord (see that description)
- In the output of a WriteRecords SS, do:
  A - New Custom Output
  B - rule!CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: pv![the pv your wrote],
        recordsUpdated: ac!RecordsUpdated,
        fksToParent: {list of record fields that are FKs to the primary PK you wrote}
      )
  C - Save this back to the pv you wrote

MAPPING FKS:
- Using this rule in the current state, child-FKs can only be set 
where they map back to the primary record type, using input "fksToParent".
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case", 
    - you could set "Case.Comment.caseId"
    - you could set "Case.Comment.Replies.caseId"
    - but not "Case.Comment.Replies.commentId" (since the FK "commentId" is not the PK of "Case")
- To set other foreign keys, you would have to run manual update rules using the result of this.
Note:
- "fksToParent" is optimized for 1:M relationships.
  - Setting an fkToParent for a 1:1 will create an instance of that child record if it is null.

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The result of THIS rule will have data that IS considered changed, 
so a designer should be cautious about re-writing this later in process 
as it could cause race condition and performance side affects.

- Also, the result of this WILL NOT have custom-fields calculated, 
since they can be changed as a result of the write, but this rule is not re-querying.
If you need these, then re-query.

- This should generally only be used for downstream flows that don't write it directly again, 
such as document processing, emails, etc.
*/
if(
  or(
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)),
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
  ),
  if(
    count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)) = 0,
    ri!processData,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated))),
      expression: rule!CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: a!flatten(ri!processData)[fv!index],
        recordsUpdated: cast(
          runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData)),
          ri!recordsUpdated
        )[fv!index],
        fksToParent: ri!fksToParent
      )
    )
  ),
  a!localVariables(
    local!keys: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!keys(ri!recordsUpdated),
      expression: a!map(
        key: fv!item,
        isPrimaryKey: runtimetypeof(fv!item) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordField'
      )
    ),
    local!keysOrganized: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
      records: local!keys,
      field: "isPrimaryKey",
      value: true,
      filterType: "FULL_RESULT"
    ),
    local!primaryKeyField: local!keysOrganized.firstMatch.key,
    local!updates: rule!CMGT_UTIL_SetRecordFields(
      record: ri!processData,
      neverOverwrite: {
        a!map(
          field: local!primaryKeyField,
          value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField]
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!fksToParent,
          expression: a!map(
            field: fv!item,
            value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField],
            /*Children get complicated, and an update should only run if a child is actually attached*/
            applyWhen: a!match(
              value: runtimetypeof(ri!processData[fv!item]),
              equals: runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData[fv!item])),
              then: count(ri!processData[fv!item]) > 0,
              equals: tointeger(
                'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
              ),
              then: or(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: ri!processData[fv!item],
                  expression: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(fv!item)
                )
              ),
              default: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!processData[fv!item])
            )
          )
        )
      },
      childRelationships: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!keysOrganized.rejects,
        expression: a!map(
          field: fv!item.key,
          value: if(
            rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(ri!processData[fv!item.key]),
            ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
            rule!CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
              processData: ri!processData[fv!item.key],
              recordsUpdated: ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
              fksToParent: {}
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    /*reduce over updates to remove any relationships that were incorrectly created with just an fk*/
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!fksToParent),
      local!updates,
      reduce(
        rule!CMGT_UTIL_RemoveRecordRelationshipsWithSingleKey_Reducer(record: _, key: _),
        local!updates,
        a!keys(local!updates)
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e990-c462-8000-9ba7-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_Document_RecordAction_CaseUpload_SaveLogic
_a-0000e990-c462-8000-9ba7-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The point of this rule is to merge the uploaded Appian Document objects with 
the existing CMGT_Document record objects
*/
a!save(
  ri!documents,
  a!localVariables(
    /*
    Get all the unique Appian Document objects from 
      1. The already uploaded documents & newly uploaded documents (ri!documents.appianDocId)
      2. The newly uploaded documents (save!value)
    */
    local!appianDocIds: reject(
      a!isNullOrEmpty,
      a!flatten(
        {
          a!flatten(ri!documents)[recordType!CMGT_Document.appianDocId],
          save!value
        }
      )
    ),
    local!uniqueAppianDocIds: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Distinct(local!appianDocIds),
    /*
    For each one, if it's already assigned to a CMGT_Document object, attach it to that,
    otherwise generate a new CMGT_Document object
    */
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!uniqueAppianDocIds,
      expression: displayvalue(
        tointeger(fv!item),
        tointeger(
          a!flatten(ri!documents)[recordType!CMGT_Document.appianDocId]
        ),
        a!flatten(ri!documents),
        recordType!CMGT_Document(
          recordType!CMGT_Document.appianDocId: fv!item,
          recordType!CMGT_Document.caseId: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.caseId],
          recordType!CMGT_Document.taskId: ri!task[recordType!CMGT_Task.taskId],
          recordType!CMGT_Document.isPrivate: if(
            rule!CMGT_LA_UTIL_IsLimitedAccessOrPortal(),
            false,
            #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:isusermemberofgroup?okey=a!isUserMemberOfGroup"(
              loggedInUser(),
              cons!CMGT_GRP_INTERNAL_USERS
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

    map2: ri!formattingOptions
  ),
  /*The actual rendering is very hard to predict based on what notes are actually present and their complexity*/
  /*Therefore, these are 2 parameters, each with 2 options, that drastically impact the rendering*/
  local!renderingOptions: {
    a!map(st: "roots", te: false),
    a!map(st: "roots", te: true)
  },
  /*NOTE: So far this seems the best rendering algorithm that accounts for the most node complexity*/

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",

      marginAbove: "MORE",

      choiceLabels: enumerate(count(local!renderingOptions)) + 1,
      choiceValues: enumerate(count(local!renderingOptions)) + 1,

    fn!networkChartField(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",

        navigationButtons: a!defaultValue(ri!showNavButtons, true),
        hover: true
      ),
      physics: local!formattingOptions.physics
    )
  }
)

_a-0000ece2-0128-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!hoursDisplayText: a!match(
    value: tointeger(ri!slaMap.hours),
    equals: 1,
    then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:23f7f8d6-1ee1-4c2f-9e69-9dac7a0f84c3"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:42dba5ab-df86-47d7-b3b0-7d36112974ca": fv!value
    ),
    whenTrue: fv!value > 0,
    then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0aef6bec-8ebf-45d8-965f-b49fcc6b235a"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:a8eaf3d9-e323-4137-83ac-b5aaf9bc4873": fv!value
    ),
    default: ""
  ),
  local!minutesDisplayText: a!match(
    value: tointeger(ri!slaMap.minutes),
    equals: 1,
    then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:bf434663-6032-440b-8189-a41db6225d08"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:b0afebcf-7288-495a-9ab7-5febfd9e2ae0": fv!value
    ),
    whenTrue: fv!value > 0,
    then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:492cba40-cef4-46e6-85e3-833a070a03ea"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:fa416d94-d663-47ee-88f7-175b0ba06963": fv!value
    ),
    default: ""
  ),
  local!daysDisplayText: a!match(
    value: tointeger(ri!slaMap.days),
    equals: 1,
    then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9ee3dd60-6fb6-4843-be79-2e9c40e08f34"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:6fd9c2a8-e621-4d75-834e-aaaadc92f269": fv!value
    ),
    whenTrue: fv!value > 0,
    then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:820111e5-8925-4832-88ca-14086aa4660e"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:29106bce-e5f7-4e8a-857a-1bb1d86b79f7": fv!value
    ),
    whenTrue: and(
      or(
        tointeger(ri!slaMap.hours) = 0,
        tointeger(ri!slaMap.minutes) = 0,
        fv!value = 0
      ),
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!hoursDisplayText),
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!minutesDisplayText)
    ),
    then: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:820111e5-8925-4832-88ca-14086aa4660e"(
      #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:29106bce-e5f7-4e8a-857a-1bb1d86b79f7": 0
    ),
    default: ""
  ),
  a!defaultValue(
    value: joinarray(
      {
        local!daysDisplayText,
        local!hoursDisplayText,
        local!minutesDisplayText
      },
      " "
    ),
    default: cons!CMGT_TXT_EMPTY_VALUE
  )
)

_a-0000eca3-381d-8000-9cf0-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_generateConditionSetFromCfgCondtionSet
_a-0000eca3-381d-8000-9cf0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  /*Only need to copy over active conditions & condition sets  */
  ri!cfgConditionSet[recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.isActive] = true,
  a!localVariables(
    local!newConditionSetUuid: index(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
        records: ri!conditionSetNewUUIDMapping,
        field: "conditionSetUuid",
        value: ri!cfgConditionSet[recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.conditionSetUuid]
      ),
      "newUuid",
      null
    ),
    recordType!CMGT_ConditionSet(
      recordType!CMGT_ConditionSet.conditionSetUuid: local!newConditionSetUuid,
      recordType!CMGT_ConditionSet.parentConditionSetUuid: index(
        rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
          records: ri!conditionSetNewUUIDMapping,
          field: "conditionSetUuid",
          value: ri!cfgConditionSet[recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.parentConditionSetUuid]
        ),
        "newUuid",
        null
      ),
      recordType!CMGT_ConditionSet.taskInstanceUuid: ri!taskInstanceUUID,
      recordType!CMGT_ConditionSet.operatorCode: ri!cfgConditionSet[recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.operatorCode],
      recordType!CMGT_ConditionSet.isActive: ri!cfgConditionSet[recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.isActive],
      recordType!CMGT_ConditionSet.condition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!cfgConditionSet[recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.condition],
        expression: rule!CMGT_UTIL_RejectBlank(
          if(
            fv!item[recordType!CMGT_CFG_Condition.isActive] = true,
            recordType!CMGT_Condition(
              recordType!CMGT_Condition.conditionSetUuid: local!newConditionSetUuid,
              recordType!CMGT_Condition.fieldPathJson: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_CFG_Condition.fieldPathJson],
              recordType!CMGT_Condition.operator: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_CFG_Condition.operator],
              recordType!CMGT_Condition.valueJson: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_CFG_Condition.valueJson],
              recordType!CMGT_Condition.valueType: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_CFG_Condition.valueType],
              recordType!CMGT_Condition.isActive: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_CFG_Condition.isActive],
              recordType!CMGT_Condition.isValid: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_CFG_Condition.isValid],
              recordType!CMGT_Condition.evaluationType: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_CFG_Condition.evaluationType]
            ),
            null
          )
        )
      ),
      recordType!CMGT_ConditionSet.childConditionSet: rule!CMGT_UTIL_RejectBlank(
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!cfgConditionSet[recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.childConditionSet],
          expression: rule!CMGT_generateConditionSetFromCfgCondtionSet(
            cfgConditionSet: fv!item,
            conditionSetNewUUIDMapping: ri!conditionSetNewUUIDMapping
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  null
)

_a-0000ec90-c257-8000-9cea-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!brandingMap: rule!CMGT_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap(),
  local!triggerMessageRefresh: now(),
  local!triggerThreadRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshOnVarChange: local!triggerMessageRefresh,
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!searchTerm,
  local!pagingInfo: a!refreshVariable(
    value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 15,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.latestMessageSentDateTime,
        ascending: false
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: local!triggerMessageRefresh
  ),
  local!totalCountOfThreads: rule!CMGT_EML_TRI_QR_GetThreads(
    returnType: "TOTAL_COUNT",
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(startIndex: 1, batchSize: 1),
    additionalFilter: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.threadSet.caseId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!caseId
    ),
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerThreadRefresh
  ),
  local!threadSet: rule!CMGT_EML_TRI_QR_getThreadSets(
    caseIds: ri!caseId,
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerThreadRefresh
  ),
  /*query to fetch threads and to fetch the threads with search term in subject or recipient*/
  local!availableThreads: rule!CMGT_EML_TRI_QR_GetThreads(
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    returnType: "DATA_SUBSET",
    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.latestMessageSentDateTime,
      false
    ),
    fields: {
      recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.originalSender
    },
    threadStatuses: {
      cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_TRIAGE_STATUS_CREATED_CASE,
      cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_TRIAGE_STATUS_LINKED_TO_CASE
    },
    threadSetIds: local!threadSet[recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_ThreadSet.threadSetId],
    searchTerm: local!searchTerm,
    searchFields: {
      recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.subject,
      recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.messages.messageRecipients.recipient,
      recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.messages.messageRecipients.recipientEmail,
      recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.messages.messageText.plainTextMessage
    },
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!threadSet),
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerThreadRefresh
  ),
  local!selectedThread: index(local!availableThreads.data, 1, null),
  local!isShowMore: false(),
  /*Show Reply Thread Box*/
  local!isReplyThread: a!refreshVariable(
    value: false,
    refreshOnVarChange: local!selectedThread
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_headerContentLayout"(
    header: {},
    contents: {
      if(
        local!totalCountOfThreads > 0,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paneLayout"(
          panes: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pane"(
              contents: rule!CMGT_EML_TRI_EmailListPane(
                brandingMap: local!brandingMap,
                isEmailPaneCollapsed: false,
                availableThreads: local!availableThreads,
                pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
                selectedThread: local!selectedThread,
                searchTerm: local!searchTerm,
                isShowMore: local!isShowMore,
                showEmailPaneCollapsible: false,
                triggerRefresh: local!triggerThreadRefresh,
                caseId: ri!caseId
              ),
              width: if(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"("DESKTOP_NARROW"),
                "NARROW_PLUS",
                "MEDIUM"
              ),
              padding: "LESS",
              accessibilityText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:297cf25d-abb6-4d91-b9ed-ab0139f56398"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pane"(
              contents: if(
                rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(local!selectedThread),
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
                  contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                    value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                      text: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:3e0fc9e7-c6d2-4a9f-8c8d-4aa05e5db601",
                      color: local!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor
                    ),
                    align: "CENTER",
                    marginAbove: "EVEN_MORE"
                  ),
                  marginAbove: "EVEN_MORE",
                  showBorder: false
                ),
                rule!CMGT_EML_TRI_SingleEmailThreadDisplay(
                  thread: local!selectedThread,
                  brandingMap: local!brandingMap,
                  isShowMore: local!isShowMore,
                  showTriageActions: false,
                  showOnlyMessages: false,
                  isReplyThread: local!isReplyThread,
                  triggerMessageRefresh: local!triggerMessageRefresh
                )
              ),
              width: "AUTO",
              backgroundColor: if(
                rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(local!selectedThread),
                local!brandingMap.CardBackgroundColor,
                local!brandingMap.DefaultBackgroundColor
              ),
              accessibilityText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:97278c4f-8d42-480c-a08d-8fdec081de09"
            )
          }
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
          contents: rule!CMGT_EML_TRI_DisplayEmptyState(
            brandingMap: local!brandingMap,
            primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:d524db8c-da5c-4985-9230-7f0ba519bf31",
            primaryTextSize: "MEDIUM",
            primaryTextStyle: "STRONG",
            secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:d2dfe0b2-52d0-43cf-b269-0bb64613ec81",
            docImage: cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_DOC_EMAIL_EMPTY_STATE,
            imageSize: "SMALL_PLUS",
            imageMarginBelow: "MORE",
            additionalContent: {
              /*Call compose action here*/
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordActionField_v1"(
                actions: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordActionItem"(
                  action: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:d81cdd0e-c54d-4b8e-beec-b7ae37fefe7f/7ffab74c-2945-4eba-839d-ee44fae211ba",
                  identifier: ri!caseId
                ),
                display: "LABEL_AND_ICON",
                style: "TOOLBAR_PRIMARY",
                showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!caseId),
                align: "CENTER"
              )
            }
          ),
          padding: "EVEN_MORE",
          marginAbove: "STANDARD",
          style: "TRANSPARENT",
          showBorder: false()
        )
      )
    },
    backgroundColor: local!brandingMap.DefaultBackgroundColor
  )
)

_a-0000eab0-e049-8000-9c27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_DropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord
_a-0000eab0-e049-8000-9c27-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The main rule to "cleanse" the input of a WriteRecords SS node to remove non-writable relationships.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable (see that description)
- In the input of a WriteRecords SS (NOT in a previous script task), do:
  A - Expressionable input to "Records" intput
  B - rule!CMGT_UTIL_DropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord(
        records: pv![the pv to write],
        relationships: {list of record relationships that are not allowed to be written}
      )

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The reason to run this in the input of the WriteRecords SS instead of a previous script task
is that, when used with CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable, you can maintain the relationships
that you had to drop before writing.
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case" but it has a child-relationship "Address" that cannot be written,
    - this will drop "Address" before attempting to write
    - if the output is configured properly it will reattach "Address" in the output
    - the overall result is that you basically ran the node as if "Address" was ignored, 
      so that you can use it later in the process flow
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: a!flatten(ri!records),
  expression: reduce(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_DropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord_Reducer(
      record: _,
      relationship: _
    ),
    fv!item,
    ri!relationships
  )
)

af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.name: CMGT_UTIL_Filter
af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    apply(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_CreateFieldValuePair(
        field: _,
        value: ri!value,
        allFields: a!flatten(ri!field)
      ),
      a!flatten(ri!field)
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

bd8f3e49-406c-4eab-a3a4-ce119dfbb5ce.name: CMGT_UTIL_RichTextField
bd8f3e49-406c-4eab-a3a4-ce119dfbb5ce.sail_code:
a!localVariables( /* This should never be above 4000 characters as it will go over the amount allowed in synced records If using the RTE in other places for customization, the field length should be 4000 characters to allow for additional HTML to be added. The RTE calculates the max length allowed on the front end for the end-user, but will not go over that amount on the back-end */ local!maxSize: a!defaultValue( value: ri!maxSize, default: cons!CMGT_INT_MAX_CHAR_LIMIT_EXTRA_LARGE ), if( cons!CMGT_BOL_AUTOMATION_TESTING_LABEL_SWITCH, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: ri!label, labelPosition: if(rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(ri!label),"COLLAPSED",ri!labelPosition), instructions: ri!instructions, helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip, placeholder: ri!placeholder, value: rule!CMGT_UTIL_StripHtmlTags(value: ri!value, isFormatted: true), saveInto: a!save( ri!value, "

" & substitute(save!value, char(10), "
") & "

" ), refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter, characterLimit: local!maxSize, height: ri!height, showWhen: ri!showWhen, required: ri!required, requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage, readOnly: ri!readOnly, disabled: ri!disabled ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_styledTextEditorField"( label: ri!label, labelPosition: if(rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(ri!label),"COLLAPSED",ri!labelPosition), instructions: ri!instructions, helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip, placeholder: ri!placeholder, value: ri!value, saveInto: { ri!value, ri!additionalSaves }, sizeLimit: local!maxSize, height: a!defaultValue(ri!height, "SHORT_PLUS"), showWhen: ri!showWhen, required: ri!required, requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage, readOnly: ri!readOnly, disabled: ri!disabled, validations: ri!validations ) ) )

_a-0000ed6e-4eb8-8000-9d48-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_Automation_ConstructCreationOfAutomationTask
_a-0000ed6e-4eb8-8000-9d48-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(ri!caseTypeWorkflowTasks),
  {},
  a!localVariables(
    local!newTaskInstanceUUIDs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!caseTypeWorkflowTasks,
      expression: rule!CMGT_UTIL_GenerateUuid_NonPlugin()
    ),
    local!taskActionNewUUIDMapping: a!flatten(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!caseTypeWorkflowTasks,
        expression: a!flatten(
          {
            a!map(
              taskActionUuid: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.automationTaskAction.taskActionUuid],
              newUuid: rule!CMGT_UTIL_GenerateUuid_NonPlugin()
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!caseTypeWorkflowTasks,
      expression: a!localVariables(
        local!childConditionSets:rule!CMGT_WFL_QR_GetConditionSet(
          additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.parentConditionSetUuid,
            operator: "=",
            value: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.conditionSet.conditionSetUuid]
          ),
          isActive: true,
          fields: {recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.condition}
        ),
        local!updatedConditionSet: if(
          rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(
            fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.conditionSet]
          ),
          #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
            data: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.conditionSet],
            index: recordType!CMGT_CFG_ConditionSet.childConditionSet,
            value: local!childConditionSets
          ),
          null()
        ),
        local!conditionSetNewUUIDMapping: rule!CMGT_generateConditionSetUuidMap(
          cfgConditionSet: local!updatedConditionSet
        ),
        recordType!CMGT_Task(
          recordType!CMGT_Task.taskInstanceUuid: local!newTaskInstanceUUIDs[fv!index],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.caseTypeWorkflowTaskUuid: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.caseTypeWorkflowTaskUuid],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.caseId: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.caseId],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.taskBehaviorTypeId: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.taskBehaviorTypeId],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.title: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.label],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.questionLabel: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.questionLabel],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.description: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.description],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.startsByDefault: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.startsByDefault],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.sla: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.sla],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.sortOrder: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.sortOrder],
          recordType!CMGT_Task.taskIntentionCode: a!defaultValue(ri!taskIntentionCode, fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.taskIntentionCode]),
          recordType!CMGT_Task.automationParentWorkflowTaskInstanceUuid: ri!parentWorkflowTaskUuid,
          recordType!CMGT_Task.milestoneId: index(
            rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
              records: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.milestones],
              field: recordType!CMGT_Milestone.referenceMilestoneUuid,
              value: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.referenceMilestone.milestoneUuid]
            ),
            recordType!CMGT_Milestone.milestoneId,
            null
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_Task.conditionSet: if(
            a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
              fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.conditionSet]
            ),
            rule!CMGT_generateConditionSetFromCfgCondtionSet(
              cfgConditionSet: local!updatedConditionSet,
              conditionSetNewUUIDMapping: local!conditionSetNewUUIDMapping,
              taskInstanceUUID: local!newTaskInstanceUUIDs[fv!index]
            ),
            null
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_Task.automationTaskAction: if(
            a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
              fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.automationTaskAction]
            ),
            rule!CMGT_generateTaskActionFromCfgTaskAction(
              cfgTaskAction: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.automationTaskAction],
              taskActionNewUUIDMapping: local!taskActionNewUUIDMapping,
              taskInstanceUUID: local!newTaskInstanceUUIDs[fv!index]
            ),
            null
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_Task.automationTrigger: a!defaultValue(
            value: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.automationTrigger],
            default: null
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_Task.triggerContext: a!defaultValue(
            value: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.triggerContext],
            default: null
          ),
          recordType!CMGT_Task.roles: if(
            fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.taskBehaviorType.isAutomated],
            recordType!CMGT_Role(
              recordType!CMGT_Role.username: cons!CMGT_TXT_PROCESS_AUTOMATION,
              recordType!CMGT_Role.roleTypeId: cons!CMGT_REFID_ROLE_TYPE_USER_ASSIGNEE
            ),
            if(
              a!isNullOrEmpty(
                fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.defaultGroupAssignee]
              ),
              {},
              recordType!CMGT_Role(
                recordType!CMGT_Role.groupId: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeWorkflowTask.defaultGroupAssignee],
                recordType!CMGT_Role.roleTypeId: cons!CMGT_REFID_ROLE_TYPE_GROUP_ASSIGNEE
              )
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ecac-72b0-8000-9cf2-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_ReturnFieldEvaluationByType
_a-0000ecac-72b0-8000-9cf2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  typeof(a!map()),
  a!match(
    value: ri!type,
    equals: "BOOLEAN",
    then: a!map(
      evalRule: rule!CMGT_Condition_EvaluationForBooleanFields
    ),
    whenTrue: contains(
      { "TEXT", "LONG_TEXT", "XL_TEXT" },
      fv!value
    ),
    then: a!map(
      evalRule: rule!CMGT_Condition_EvaluationForTextFields
    ),
    equals: "DATE",
    then: a!map(
      evalRule: rule!CMGT_Condition_EvaluationforDateFields
    ),
    whenTrue: or(
      fv!value = "DECIMAL",
      fv!value = "INTEGER"
    ),
    then: a!map(
      evalRule: rule!CMGT_Condition_EvaluationForIntegerAndDecimalFields
    ),
    equals: "DATETIME",
    then: a!map(
      evalRule: rule!CMGT_Condition_EvaluationForDateTimeFields
    ),
    whenTrue: or(fv!value="RecordType", fv!value="USERNAME"),
    then: a!map(
      evalRule: rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_Condition_EvaluationforRecordTypeFields
    ),
    equals: "GROUP",
    then: a!map(
      evalRule: rule!CMGT_Condition_EvaluationForGroupFields
    ),
    default: a!map(
      evalRule: rule!CMGT_Condition_EvaluationforChoiceListFields
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ec34-784f-8000-9cd6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!nestedComments: rule!CMGT_QR_GetComment(
    returnType: "OBJECT_ARRAY",
    caseId: ri!caseId,
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1, 1000),
    includeChildComments: true(),
    /*Since we are nesting child comments inside parent comments, querying only for parent comments*/
    onlyParentComments: true(),
    /*summarize only for active and private comments*/
    additionalFilters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!CMGT_Comment.isActive,
        operator: "=",
        value: true
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!CMGT_Comment.isPrivate,
        operator: "=",
        value: true
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!CMGT_Comment.taskId,
        operator: "is null"
      )
    },
    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      recordType!CMGT_Comment.createdOn,
      true
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!nestedComments,
    expression: a!map(
      commenter: fv!item[#"urn:appian:record-field:v1:e57250b0-f216-4a23-afd9-39e7d532d302-cmgt/f1bcb252-9f3e-40ce-bb79-5a8359cef95d-cmgt/SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER_FIELD_firstAndLastName"],
      createdOn: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Comment.createdOn],
      commentText: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Comment.commentText],
      childComments: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Comment.childComments],
        expression: a!map(
          commenter: fv!item[#"urn:appian:record-field:v1:e57250b0-f216-4a23-afd9-39e7d532d302-cmgt/f1bcb252-9f3e-40ce-bb79-5a8359cef95d-cmgt/SYSTEM_RECORD_TYPE_USER_FIELD_firstAndLastName"],
          createdOn: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Comment.createdOn],
          commentText: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Comment.commentText]
        )
      ),
      totalCommentCharCount: sum(tointeger(len(fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Comment.commentText])),tointeger(len(fv!item[recordType!CMGT_Comment.childComments.commentText])))

    )
  )
)

_a-0000eb57-0ad2-8000-9c6b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!edgesFromOrderedNodes: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
      records: ri!allEdges,
      field: "from",
      value: ri!orderedNodes.id
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  local!edgesToUnorderedNodes: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
      filterType: "REJECT",
      records:local!edgesFromOrderedNodes,
      field: "to",
      value: ri!orderedNodes.id
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  local!dependentUnorderedNodes: a!refreshVariable(
    value:  rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter(
      records: ri!allNodes,
      field: "id",
      value: local!edgesToUnorderedNodes.to
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  local!nodesToOrder: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!CMGT_UTIL_cast(
      typeOf: {a!map()},
      value: apply(
        rule!CMGT_NCF_updateNodeOrderBasedOnPrecedents(
          allEdges: ri!allEdges,
          currentNode: _,
          edgesToUnorderedNodes: local!edgesToUnorderedNodes,
          orderedNodes: ri!orderedNodes
        ),
        local!dependentUnorderedNodes
      )
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  union(ri!orderedNodes, local!nodesToOrder)
)

)

_a-0000e9dc-ab93-8000-9bc2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!noTasks: if(
    tointeger(
      ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.totalNonAutomatedTasks]
    ) > 0,
    false,
    true
  ),
  {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Case Identitifer"),
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
          icon: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.priority.icon],
          altText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:62c1d184-cd2b-4147-82cc-a8c82f4e295f",
          caption: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.priority.priorityName],
          color: rule!CMGT_UTIL_DisplayBranding(
            brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
            key: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.priority.iconColor]
          )
        ),
        " ",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.friendlyId],
          color: ri!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor
        )
      },
      marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Case Title"),
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.title],
          link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
            recordType: recordType!CMGT_Case,
            identifier: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.caseId],
            showWhen: ri!showRecordLink
          ),
          linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
          color: ri!brandingMap.StandardTextColor,
          size: "STANDARD",
          style: "STRONG"
        )
      },
      preventWrapping: true,
      marginBelow: "STANDARD"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
      label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Case Staus"),
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      tags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
        text: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.status.statusLabel],
        backgroundColor: rule!CMGT_UTIL_DisplayBranding(
          brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
          key: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.status.softColor]
        ),
        textColor: rule!CMGT_UTIL_DisplayBranding(
          brandingMap: ri!brandingMap,
          key: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.status.textColor]
        )
      ),
      size: "SMALL"
    ),
    /*Case Progress Bar*/
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_progressBarField"(
      label: rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReturnLabelGivenAutomationTestingSwitch(testingLabel: "Task Progress"),
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      percentage: if(
        local!noTasks,
        0,
        round(
          (
            ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.resolvedNonAutomatedTasks] / ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.totalNonAutomatedTasks]
          ) * 100,
          0
        )
      ),
      color: if(
        local!noTasks,
        ri!brandingMap.SelectedCardColor,
        ri!brandingMap.AccentColor
      ),
      marginBelow: "LESS",
      showPercentage: false
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      label: "Task Progress",
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:8a99825e-a1fa-4045-9d92-038d53ca38c4",
          size: "SMALL",
          showWhen: local!noTasks
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.resolvedNonAutomatedTasks] & "/" & ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.totalNonAutomatedTasks],
          size: "SMALL",
          style: "STRONG",
          showWhen: not(local!noTasks)
        ),
        char(32),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0099b722-243f-4eeb-ac3f-09f2359228e5",
          size: "SMALL",
          showWhen: not(local!noTasks)
        )
      },
      align: "RIGHT"
    ),
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_DisplayDueDate(
      dueOn: ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.dueOn],
      showAsOverdueWhen: tointeger(
        ri!case[recordType!CMGT_Case.statusId]
      ) <> cons!CMGT_REFID_STATUS_CASE_CLOSED,
      size: "SMALL",
      align: "LEFT",
      additionalText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0fef6afa-51d1-49a6-8b45-055c403a05d3",
      defaultTextColor: ri!brandingMap.StandardTextColor,
      brandingMap: ri!brandingMap
    )
  }
)
